extensionDescription.message: Quickly move messages into other folders using the keyboard

windowWarning.message: It is recommended to add Quick Folder Move to the main toolbar. Please customize your toolbar to enable the button.

metaActionWarning.message: Switching between actions now requires using Ctrl/⌘+Arrow to avoid navigation conflicts in the text box.

tagsViewMissingWarning.message: Please enable the 'Tags' folder view to go to tag folders.

markAsRead.message: Mark messages as read when moving

showFolderPath.message: Show full path of each folder in search box

maxRecentFolders.message: Number of recent folders to show

maxRecentFoldersTitle.message: Changes the number of recent folders shown when no search text is entered.

useLegacyShortcutsTitle.message: Use ⇧M as the shortcut for moving messages

defaultFoldersSearchPlaceholder.message: Search for a folder to add as default

excludedFoldersSearchPlaceholder.message: Search for a folder to exclude

partialMatchFullPath.message: Search for keywords within the entire folder path

searchAccountName.message: Search for keywords also within the account name

operationAction.move.message: Moved $num_messages$ message to folder $destination$;Moved $num_messages$ messages to folder $destination$
operationAction.move.description: List all plural forms for this sentence, separated by ';', following your language's plural rules. The order must match the language's pluralization pattern: singular first, then all plural variations. Example: 'apple;apples' (English), 'pomme;pommes' (French), 'jabłko;jabłka;jabłek' (Polish), 'تفاح;تفاحة;تفاحتان;تفاحات;تفاحة;تفاح' (Arabic).

operationAction.copy.message: Copied $num_messages$ message to folder $destination$;Copied $num_messages$ messages to folder $destination$
operationAction.copy.description: List all plural forms for this sentence, separated by ';', following your language's plural rules. The order must match the language's pluralization pattern: singular first, then all plural variations. Example: 'apple;apples' (English), 'pomme;pommes' (French), 'jabłko;jabłka;jabłek' (Polish), 'تفاح;تفاحة;تفاحتان;تفاحات;تفاحة;تفاح' (Arabic).

operationAction.tag.message: Tagged $num_messages$ message with tag $destination$;Tagged $num_messages$ messages with tag $destination$
operationAction.tag.description: List all plural forms for this sentence, separated by ';', following your language's plural rules. The order must match the language's pluralization pattern: singular first, then all plural variations. Example: 'apple;apples' (English), 'pomme;pommes' (French), 'jabłko;jabłka;jabłek' (Polish), 'تفاح;تفاحة;تفاحتان;تفاحات;تفاحة;تفاح' (Arabic).

notificationActive.message: Show a notification for each operation

menuItemActionInfo.message: Choose which actions should be available in the popup menu.

menuItemActionWarning.message: At least one item must be selected.
